content: Hi all - anyone have experience of this happening? I am seeing reference extensions in a STU3 IG build with no type being shown Reference() eg. http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base-stu3/branches/master/StructureDefinition-au-allergyintolerance.html - used to work; did I miss something that changed?
it's on my list. but my list grows by the minute :-(
thanks - hang in there; we appreciate it
Info on this one - ty kindly @Richard Townley-O'Neill + @Dusica Bojicic - the issue was related to path expression needing to be <path value="Extension.value[x]" /> - this seems to be resolved now
was something that seems to have worked in the past where <path value="Extension.valueReference" /> was the original content
